name: Pyxel Image Document
summary: Learn about .PYXEL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The PYXEL file format uses Zip compression. You can rename the ".pyxel" extension to ".zip" and unzip the file. When extracting the contents there will be a folder that contains .PNG tile and layer files and a .JSON file with information, such as colors, settings, layers, and tiles, that describes the PYXEL file.
NOTE: Pyxel Edit can export a PYXEL image to the PNG, JPEG, and GIF formats.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
